pages.text: $(li)Trickers are creatures that can only appears in $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raids$(/l) that will not attack you directly.$(br)$(li)They can throw you spells to reduce your speed dramatically or or change the position you are in to where they are currently located.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/totem_of_undying)Totem of Undying$(/l), or rarely a $(l:patchouli:armors/mask_of_dishonesty)Mask of Dishonesty$(/l).
